describe: Finland, a Nordic country in Northern Europe, is known for its stunning natural landscapes, including vast forests, thousands of lakes, and the magical Northern Lights. It is a country that values education, innovation, and sustainability, and is often ranked as one of the happiest countries in the world.

cities.name: üèù Helsinki
cities.geographical_location: Located on the southern coast of Finland, facing the Gulf of Finland.
cities.climate: Helsinki has a humid continental climate with cold winters and mild to warm summers.

cities.name: üå≥ Rovaniemi
cities.geographical_location: Situated in the northern part of Finland, near the Arctic Circle.
cities.climate: Rovaniemi has a subarctic climate with cold, snowy winters and mild summers.

cities.name: üè∞ Turku
cities.geographical_location: Located in the southwest of Finland, along the Aura River.
cities.climate: Turku has a humid continental climate with cold winters and warm summers.
